mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_student_new where activity_id =#{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade}
SELECT * from t_school_new where OrgName = #{OrgName}
SELECT count(*) from t_student_new s where s.activity_id = #{activityId} and s.school = #{school} and last_check_time is not null
SELECT count(*) from t_student_new s where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and last_check_time is not null and grade=#{grade}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school})a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0
SELECT count(*) FROM t_student_new where activity_id =#{activityId} and school = #{school} and student_sex = #{studentSex}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} and student_class = #{studentClass}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} and student_class = #{studentClass})a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} and student_class = #{studentClass})a where a.jinshi < 5.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi >= 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing >= -0.5 and b.dengxiaoqiujing <= 0.75 and b.dengxiaoqiujing != 0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi >= 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5 and b.dengxiaoqiujing != 0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5 and b.dengxiaoqiujing >= -3.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -3.0 and b.dengxiaoqiujing > -6.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing <= -6.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi = 4.9

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi >=4.6 and a.jinshi <= 4.9

SELECT `id`,`activity_name`,`del_flag`,`add_time`,`update_date`,sys_id from t_activity_list_new where sys_id = #{sysId} and add_time < #{addTime} ORDER BY add_time desc LIMIT 1
SELECT count(*) from t_student where school = '济南市外海实验学校' and last_check_time = DATE_FORMAT('2019-12-11','%Y-%m-%d')
